channel.title: Comments on: Day 8 – Just a Bad Day – Thursday, April 13

item.title: By: Erica Y.
item.dc:creator: Erica Y.
item.description: It is so infuriating that a nurse would make such a self-serving "judgement call"! I'm glad that they're not getting away with it. It's awesome that she's progressing with her exercises! I'm rooting for her and keeping everyone in my thoughts and prayers! <3<3<3
item.content:encoded: It is so infuriating that a nurse would make such a self-serving “judgement call”! I’m glad that they’re not getting away with it. It’s awesome that she’s progressing with her exercises! I’m rooting for her and keeping everyone in my thoughts and prayers! <3<3<3

item.title: By: Mary and Al
item.dc:creator: Mary and Al
item.description: Hey guys.... glad and thankful to hear that Sue is at least moving somewhat forward. Al and I are continuing to pray for all of you! Please let us know if you need us to do anything
item.content:encoded:
Hey guys…. glad and thankful to hear that Sue is at least moving somewhat forward.
Al and I are continuing to pray for all of you!
Please let us know if you need us to do anythingðŸ˜˜

item.title: By: Ellie McDougall
item.dc:creator: Ellie McDougall
item.description: I'm so glad they got her up & moved her to chair. Every little movement helps, I'm sure. The things that happen on a daily basis there certainly will require an advocate for Sue to be present for her. Glad you are all there. Prayers for her continuing progress.
item.content:encoded: I’m so glad they got her up & moved her to chair. Every little movement helps, I’m sure. The things that happen on a daily basis there certainly will require an advocate for Sue to be present for her. Glad you are all there. Prayers for her continuing progress.

item.title: By: cindy with one "i"
item.dc:creator: cindy with one "i"
item.description: So good to see her out of that bed! Very frustrating someone would sedate her knowing she would be seeing PT/OT this afternoon! Or mentioning it before hand as you've been completely engaged in care! Hopefully her night won't be as bad tonight. Hugs and continuing prayers.
item.content:encoded: So good to see her out of that bed! Very frustrating someone would sedate her knowing she would be seeing PT/OT this afternoon! Or mentioning it before hand as you’ve been completely engaged in care! Hopefully her night won’t be as bad tonight. Hugs and continuing prayers.

item.title: By: Linda Lawson
item.dc:creator: Linda Lawson
item.description: So happy that Mama Sue enjoying her book - love her so much!
item.content:encoded: So happy that Mama Sue enjoying her book – love her so much!
